string.text:
%c[ui_gray_1]Zone made silencer to reduce the noise produced by a 23x75 gauge shotgun's shot, so as not to attract (too much) (relatively) (at least a bit) attention. The design turned out to be thunderous and heavy, inconvenient for a silencer, but that's as good as it gets.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Sound suppression: %c[ui_gray_1]low
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 23mm Cal.
